English: I spent the whole day on the beach.
I'm laying on the beach in a sun chair.
I put the towel on the sand.
I'm laying on my beach towel.
The little boys play on the beach.
The children splash in the water.
The children are building a sand castle.
A wave washes the sand castle away.
The waves wash over the beach.
I wade back to the shore.
It's always a little windy at the beach.
Hungarian: Mindig kicsit szeles van a parton.

English: There are palm trees on the beach.
Seagulls are flying over the sea.
